Andreas Ellmauthaler

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/9100840804816580
  • Última atualização do currículo em 24/02/2015

Andreas Ellmauthaler was born in Schwarzach im Pongau, Austria, in 1982. He received the Dipl.-Ing. (FH) degree from the University of Applied Sciences Salzburg, Austria, and the M.Sc. degree from Halmstad University, Sweden, both in 2007. Between 2007 and 2009 he worked as a research associate at the University of Applied Sciences Salzburg, Austria, on several industrial projects. In 2013 he concluded his Ph.D. degree in Electrical Engineering at the Federal University of Rio de Janeiro (COPPE/UFRJ), Brazil and is currently working at the Halliburton Brazil Technology Center in Rio de Janeiro as a Senior Scientist in the Center of Excellence for Advanced Photonics. His research interests lie in the field of digital signal and image processing, especially multiscale transforms and its applications to image fusion, as well as camera calibration and multiple-view systems. (Texto informado pelo autor)

Projetos de pesquisa
2009 - 2010
H.264-Setup
Projeto certificado pelo(a) coordenador(a) Eduardo Antônio Barros da Silva em 23/02/2015.
Descrição: H.264-Setup aims at creating systematic procedures for the configuration of the H.264/MPEG-4 AVC video compression standard within the Brazilian digital TV system. By doing so, the best compromise between video quality, compression rate and transmission delay is sought..
Situação: Concluído; Natureza: Pesquisa.

Integrantes: Andreas Ellmauthaler - Integrante / Eduardo Antônio Barros da Silva - Coordenador / Alexandre Gomes Ciancio - Integrante / José Fernando Leite de Oliveira - Integrante / Felipe Moreira Lopes Ribeiro - Integrante / Guilherme Pires Sales de Carvalho - Integrante.
